com.diffplug.freshmark

Class Parser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.diffplug.freshmark.Parser
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ParserIntronExon

    public abstract class Parser
extends Object
    Parser splits text into tags and body sections, passes pairs of matching sections to a Parser.SectionCompiler, then combines that output with the original document to generate the final output.
    See Also:
    ParserIntronExon

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected static interface  Parser.ChunkHandler
      Interface for passing a chunk of the document.
      static interface  Parser.SectionCompiler
      Interface which can compile a single section of a FreshMark document.

    • Method Detail

      • bodyAndTags

        protected abstract void bodyAndTags(String fullInput,
                                    Parser.ChunkHandler body,
                                    Parser.ChunkHandler tag)
        Given an input string, parses out the body sections from the tags section.
        Parameters:
        fullInput - the raw input string
        body - called for every chunk of text outside a tag
        tag - called for every chunk of text inside a tag

      • reassemble

        protected abstract String reassemble(String section,
                                     String script,
                                     String output)
        Reassembles a section/script/output chunk back into the full file.

      • compile

        public String compile(String fullInput,
                      Parser.SectionCompiler compiler)
        Compiles an input string to an output string, using the given compiler to compile each section.
        Parameters:
        fullInput - the raw input string
        compiler - used to compile each section
        Returns:
        the compiled output string
